review: I got a defective Certified Refurbished unit, and it was a mistake because it was still defective!I got intermittent purple screen and  black screen while setting up and watching.For me, refurbished was a waste of time, and I do not want to inherit someone else's defective unit so I returned it and ordered a new unit.It was a mistake to try and save $8.I have Roku already, so I know it is good, and I would have given this five stars, so keep in mind that one star is for the still defective refurbished unit and I highly recommend Roku.

review: I never ever do reviews but I am so in love with this Roku stick. I have it in my sons room but at anytime I want to take it out of his TV and put it into any other TV in the house I can without reprogramming it. It has every app I need to either stream movies/tv shows or music. I am going to buy 2 more to put in other rooms in my house! I never have a buffering issue with it either. It works in every room in my house perfectly! BTW I purchased in Dec 2014
